name: Escape from Well
description:
As a result of the accident fell into a deep well. Get out of it avoiding traps and beating the fearsome creatures inhabiting it.

  • procedural generated levels
  • different types of enemies and traps
  • pixel-art style
  • tons of fun

Game is in development version and its contents will be expanded. Errors may occur during game action

---22-12-2016 0.3 update---

  • new floor type - unstable
  • bug fixes
